TopicTitle: New rocket designer reporting for duty

Articles.Content:
I\'ve been playing kerbal space programme for about a year now (and lurking on this forums for months) so I thought I may as come out of the shadows and say Hi.

Typically all my missions go perfectly apart from one minor setback, something like this :-[
Think you\'ve got a critical mission failure there lol
That\'s why I always have landing gear on both sides of my vehicles. Happy launching!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Can you not rock it back over onto its belly with RCS?

Welcome!
That was my main problem with my first mun landing attempt. Anyway, welcome to the forums.
